label: Lingerie and Underwear
description: Market category encompassing lingerie and underwear for men and women.
intents: Buy lingerie for a special occasion

subcategories.label: Bras
subcategories.description: Undergarments designed to support and cover the breasts.

subcategories.label: Underwear
subcategories.description: Clothing worn under outer garments, typically next to the skin.

subcategories.label: Lingerie Sets
subcategories.description: Matching sets of lingerie, typically including a bra and underwear.

subcategories.label: Shapewear
subcategories.description: Undergarments designed to shape and smooth the body.

subcategories.label: Stockings and Hosiery
subcategories.description: Garments worn on the legs and feet, typically made of nylon or other synthetic materials.

subcategories.label: Lingerie Accessories
subcategories.description: Accessories designed to enhance or complement lingerie.
